thread.section_title: DPDgroup Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DPDgroup | www.dpd.com | 6 of 110
thread.title: Theodore Evelyn Mosby
thread.title_full: DPDgroup reviewed by Theodore Evelyn Mosby

author: Theodore Evelyn Mosby
title: Theodore Evelyn Mosby
text: Dpd gave me a delivery time update as soon as the package was due to arrive the next day ... and then they updated me with a timeframe of an HOUR (!! So convenient) within which my package would arrive ... 9-10 am (arrived 9:50) ... thoroughly impressed with the service. Package was adequately packaged and not damaged/ delivery guy super friendly. Recommended!
